name: BYGONE - A Soldier's Tale
description: BYGONE take aspects and the concept of war, package it in a optimized and accessible site for users to utilize as a form of entertainment or for light educational purposes. The design is to provide the user a simple but engaging form of entertainment with a fictional narrative-based campaign supported by interactive minigames. The games being the primary focus of the application with the story as a supporting feature. The users can simply experience the individual game mode, or experience it in context with the single player campaign.

name: DOTMA
description: The DOTMA Identity. Created as side brand of the '.ma' group.

name: Cafe Culture
description: This term, The Year 11 Information Technology Systems class has been approached by a client, Lockhart River State School to create a logotype. The client Lockhart River State School has started a community ‘café’ project which requires a new logo and an associated animation. Under the name ‘Café Culture’ and their slogan ‘The best coffee in the cape’ the design will attempt to reflect the community spirit and culture in that area.

name: B Natural
description: This term in year 11 Information Technology Systems class has been approached by an existing all natural energy drinks company ‘bnatural’. Due to its languishing sales as a result of an influx of other energy drink brands. While ‘bnatural’ mas maintained a steady place hold in the market of energy drinks, the number of drink sales will necessarily need to improve in order for ‘bnatural’ to become a competitor in the flooded market of energy drink products. The client has decided to overhaul and improve the design of the can, allowing the product to uniquely standout. Directed especially at the young individuals, the product will need to capture the ‘Youth Culture’ though an attractive and unique design.

name: Portfolio 1, Item J
description:
This term year 12 Information Technology Systems class is directed to develop and produce an interactive portfolio of achievements to date. The portfolio will include major projects from ITN and other digital content which has been completed throughout the years. The final product of the portfolio will be an asset when seeking prospective employers or academic enrolments. 

The product will be a partial parallax website with dense sections as their own pages. The site will also attempt to be responsive and functional on most types of devices. The solution specification will vary based on the system the product is utilized on.
